metadata.name: CiderPal #1: Camp Cider
metadata.description:
Holders of this special pal are eligible to receive unique benefits within the Cider ecosystem! Benefits include priority access to Cider IRL events worldwide, priority consideration to be featured on our social media channels, and more! 

 In addition, holders of the Camp Cider pal will be eligible to redeem special gifts from several collections during specified redemption windows.

 Check out our website to learn more about the program and the latest news on gift redemption
